item.title: Jackye add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "It would seem that Our Lord finds our desires not too strong, but too weak. We are half-hearted creatures, fooling about with drink and sex and ambition when infinite joy is offered us, like an ignorant child who wants to go on making mud pies in a slum because he cannot imagine what is meant by the offer of a holiday at the sea. We are far too easily pleased." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Jackye add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "The reasonable man adapts himself to the world: the unreasonable one persists in trying to adapt the world to himself. Therefore all progress depends on the unreasonable man." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Jackye add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Jackye add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Jackye add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Jackye add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "We accept the love we think we deserve." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Jackye add a quote by William Cullen Bryant
item.description: "And we wept that one so lovely should have a life so brief;" -- William Cullen Bryant

item.title: Jackye add a quote by Arthur Schopenhauer
item.description: "All truth passes through three stages: First, it is ridiculed; Second, it is violently opposed; Third, it is accepted as self-evident." -- Arthur Schopenhauer

item.title: Jackye add a quote by Confucius
item.description:
"Speak the truth, do not yield to anger; give, if thou art asked for little; by these three steps thou wilt go near the gods.
راست بگو، تسليم خشم نشو، اگر از تو كم خواستند ببخش؛ با اين سه به خدايان مي رسي" -- Confucius

item.title: Jackye add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "What fresh hell is this?" -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Jackye add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "I hate writing, I love having written." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Jackye add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "Ducking for apples -- change one letter and it's the story of my life." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Jackye add a quote by Georgia O'Keeffe
item.description: "I have things in my head that are not like what anyone taught me — shapes and ideas so near to me,so natural to my way of being and thinking." -- Georgia O'Keeffe

item.title: Jackye add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "A man who procrastinates in his choosing will inevitably have his choice made for him by circumstance." -- Hunter S. Thompson
